WITH stock AS ( SELECT distOrg.pn2 AS region, distOrg.pn3 AS area, distOrg.pn4 AS unit, geo.PN2 AS province, geo.PN3 AS city, geo.PN4 AS district, dist.DIST_CODE AS distCode, dist.DIST_NAME AS distName, prod.PROD_CODE AS prodCode, prod.PROD_NAME AS prodName, data.STOCK_DATE AS stockDate, sum(case when data.BOX<0 then 0 else data.BOX end) AS box, sum(case when data.TON<0 then 0 else data.TON end) AS ton, sum(case when data.GROSS_SALES<0 then 0 else data.GROSS_SALES end) AS grossSale
FROM RPT_DATA_STOCK data inner join dms_client client on data.CLIENT_ID=client.CLIENT_ID inner join mdm_distributor dist on client.DIST_ID=dist.DIST_ID left join base_org distOrg on distOrg.ORG_ID=dist.ORG_ID left join base_dict_item geo ON geo.DICT_ITEM_ID=dist.GEO_ID AND geo.DICT_ID='geography' inner join MDM_PRODUCT prod ON prod.PROD_CODE=data.TARGET_PROD_CODE
WHERE $stockDate$ $orgId$ $geoId$ $distId$ $distCode$ $prodName$ $prodCode$ $categoryId$ $brandId$ AND data.PROD_QUANTITY IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY distOrg.pn2, distOrg.pn3, distOrg.pn4, geo.PN2, geo.PN3, geo.PN4, dist.DIST_CODE, dist.DIST_NAME, prod.PROD_CODE, prod.PROD_NAME, data.STOCK_DATE )
SELECT a.region, a.area, a.unit, a.province, a.city, a.district, a.distCode, a.distName, a.prodCode, a.prodName, a.stockDate, a.box, a.ton, a.grossSale FROM stock a
UNION ALL
SELECT distOrg.pn2, distOrg.pn3, distOrg.pn4, geo.PN1, geo.PN2, geo.PN3, dist.DIST_CODE, dist.DIST_NAME, 'No data', 'No data', null, 0, 0, 0
from mdm_distributor dist inner join dms_client client on client.DIST_ID=dist.DIST_ID left join base_org distOrg on distOrg.ORG_ID=dist.ORG_ID left join base_dict_item geo ON geo.DICT_ITEM_ID=dist.GEO_ID AND geo.DICT_ID='geography'
where dist.DIST_CODE NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT a.distCode FROM stock a)
GROUP BY distOrg.pn2, distOrg.pn3, distOrg.pn4, geo.PN1, geo.PN2, geo.PN3, dist.DIST_CODE, dist.DIST_NAME
